channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-2659] Object reuse in UnionWithTempOperator
item.description:
The first loop in UnionWithTempOperator.run() executes until null, then the second loop attempts to reuse this null value. StephanEwen, would you like me to submit a pull request?

Stack trace:

org.apache.flink.client.program.ProgramInvocationException: The program execution failed: Job execution failed.
	at org.apache.flink.client.program.Client.run(Client.java:381)
	at org.apache.flink.client.program.Client.run(Client.java:319)

	at Driver.main(Driver.java:376)

	at org.apache.flink.client.program.Client.run(Client.java:278)

Caused by: org.apache.flink.runtime.client.JobExecutionException: Job execution failed.

	at scala.runtime.AbstractPartialFunction$mcVL$sp.apply$mcVL$sp(AbstractPartialFunction.scala:33)

	at scala.runtime.AbstractPartialFunction$mcVL$sp.apply(AbstractPartialFunction.scala:25)
	at org.apache.flink.runtime.LeaderSessionMessageFilter$$anonfun$receive$1.applyOrElse(LeaderSessionMessageFilter.scala:36)
	at scala.runtime.AbstractPartialFunction$mcVL$sp.apply$mcVL$sp(AbstractPartialFunction.scala:33)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Yes, this clearly looks like a bug.

Thank you for so thoroughly checking out the object-reuse mode...

GitHub user greghogan opened a pull request:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/1130

FLINK-2659 Fix object reuse in UnionWithTempOperator

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

$ git pull https://github.com/greghogan/flink 2659_object_reuse_in_unionwithtempoperator

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/1130.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

This closes #1130

commit 47089e5619467c245ebd259a04d2b3a42afe05d6
Author: Greg Hogan <code@greghogan.com>
Date: 2015-09-14T15:29:49Z

FLINK-2659 Fix object reuse in UnionWithTempOperator

Hi greghogan, thanks for the PR.
I gave you contributor permissions for Flink's JIRA.
You can now assign issues to yourself if you want to.

Github user fhueske commented on the pull request:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/1130#issuecomment-140788192

Thanks for the patch, looks good.
Will merge this tomorrow.
